alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Bullitt; Hardin; Jefferson; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 4:27PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Harrison, Meade, southwestern Jefferson, north central Hardin, central Breckinridge and northwestern Bullitt Counties through 500 PM EDT/400 PM CDT/... At 427 PM EDT/327 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Valley Station to near Hardinsburg. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds gusts between 40 to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Valley Station and Pleasure Ridge Park around 435 PM EDT. Hollyvilla and Fairdale around 440 PM EDT. Pioneer Village, South Park View and Okolona around 445 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Highview and Minor Lane Heights. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for south central Indiana...and central Kentucky.
